alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 19 at 9:37PM MST until November 20 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including the Cottonwood Canyons. Traction restrictions are possible. Travel may become difficult on untreated, seasonal roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow is possible tonight and the exact location and longevity of any lake band and/or lake enhanced precipitation will heavily influence higher end snow totals.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
